name: Legend of Leagues
description:
This is "Legend of Leagues", a game I made in 3 days with Unity.

You are a player that lost its mind playing a video game that he loves. Your goal is to get revenge and create chaos by destroying the entire company.

But be aware, you are not alone.

A creature from Zaun awaits you!

CONTROLS

Arrow / A-D Keys : Move Left and Right

Space : Jump

Left Click : Launch Grenade

Right Click : Paint Tag

HOW I MADE THE GAME
